title: Washington's swamp keeps getting deeper
itunes:title: Washington's swamp keeps getting deeper
description: Donald Trump promised to drain the swamp but so far he's expanded it. We've seen nepotism, conflicts of interest, self-dealing and lots and lots of lying. And we're not even a year into his presidency. Is Trump going to make Washington even sleazier? Where is the Congressional oversight? Do Americans care if the president is making money off his office?

author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
